key.name: enable-animations
key.description: Whether animations should be displayed. Note: This is a global key, it changes the behaviour of the window manager, the panel etc.

key.name: font-name
key.description: Font used to display user interface elements, such as check box labels, menu items, etc.

key.name: font-size
key.description: Point size of the font used to display user interface elements, such as check box labels, menu items, etc.

key.name: monospace-font-name
key.description: Font used to display fixed-width characters, mostly used by terminal windows.

key.name: monospace-font-size
key.description: Point size of the font used to display fixed-width characters, mostly used by terminal windows.

key.name: decorator
key.description: Style used to draw window decorations.

key.name: style
key.description: Style used to draw all user interface elements.

key.name: color-scheme
key.description: Color scheme to be applied to the user interface style. If empty, the default style's palette is used.

key.name: icon-theme
key.description: Theme used for all the icons.

key.name: cursor-size
key.description: Size of the cursor used as cursor theme.

key.name: toolbutton-style
key.description: Style of toolbar buttons. Valid values are "icon-only", "text-only", "text-beside-icon" or "text-under-icon".
